history: I see. Thanks for the guidance and awesome writeup!

Yeah I understand that problem. I still read books dating back to 2007 for the core concepts on the Windows kernel. As for actually developing drivers, I reference the Windows driver samples on GitHub, the online documentation and various forums like OSR very, very, VERY heavily just constantly swit…

I’ve been mostly a book reader – most books on windows drivers are like 10+ years now and pretty bland and lacking of examples. Any tips/…
